fundraising.body:
To date we've funded everything internally, and we'll continue to do so for at least a little while longer. It gives us an opportunity to iterate and learn without funding distractions.

If you're an investor and you're interested in what we're doing, please get in touch with stuart@opencompany.com to learn more.
fundraising.headline: Fundraising late 2016 :money_with_wings:
fundraising.title: Fundraising

team.body:
Currently we are a team of 4 plus. Stuart is CEO, and Sean is CTO, leading development with Iacopo and Martin. Next up? DESIGN!

We've been fortunate to work with two talented part-time designers, Valdis and John. Now we're looking for a designer to join our team full time. If you know someone that might be interested, please let them know about OpenCompany and ask them to apply here!

We're a distributed team currently working across four countries - the United States, Italy, Germany and Latvia - so it's possible to work from anywhere in the world.
team.headline: A Shout Out to DESIGNERS!
team.title: Team and Hiring

values.body:
TRANSPARENCY - We know openness reduces barriers and complexity, and makes it possible for stakeholders to be more fully engaged in our mission.

SIMPLICITY - We're willing to make extraordinary efforts to be simple and clear.

ORIGINAL - We'll try to solve problems from the bottom up irrespective of how they've been solved before. We're not afraid to work on solutions people don't realize they need yet.

IMPACTFUL - We spend our time on work we believe will matter 20 years from now.

DISTRIBUTED AND DIVERSE - We're building a remote-first culture that embraces global talent and respects individual ideas about what it means to work here.
values.description: Core values the company lives by
values.headline: It's too early to know ourselves completely, but we value a few things above others.
values.title: Values
